snippet: A strong stump speech is one of the most important components of a presidential campaign. Times reporters following the candidates have deconstructed and annotated four stump speeches, providing context and checking facts.
abstract: A strong stump speech is one of the most important components of a presidential campaign. Times reporters following the candidates have deconstructed and annotated four stump speeches, providing context and checking facts.
lead_paragraph: A strong stump speech is one of the most important components of a presidential campaign. In an effective speech, a candidate can weave promises and attacks, lay out ambitious plans, and connect with voters on a personal level.

headline.main: Interactive Feature: Anatomy of a Stump Speech
